title.en: Verses of Aspiration to Recite While Prostrating

text.en: Through offering prostration before the supreme Three Jewels,
text.en-trans: dak gi chok sum dampar chaktsalwé

text.en: May my own and all other beings’ misdeeds and obscurations be purified!
text.en-trans: dak dang dro kün dikdrib dakpar shok

text.en: May joining the palms of my two hands together
text.en-trans: lak nyi nyampar talmo jarwa yi

text.en: Cause us to gain the perfect unity of skilful means and wisdom!
text.en-trans: tab dang sherab zungjuk tobpar shok

text.en: May joining my hands at the crown of my head
text.en-trans: talmo chiwö tsuk tu jarwa yi

text.en: Cause us to travel to the heaven of Akaniṣṭha!
text.en-trans: womin ganden né su dröpar shok

text.en: May joining my hands at my forehead
text.en-trans: talmo mintsam tralwar jarwa yi

text.en: Cause all harmful actions and obscurations of thebodybe purified!
text.en-trans: lü kyi dikdrib tamché dakpar shok

text.en: May joining my hands to the level of my throat
text.en-trans: talmo drinpé tedu jarwa yi

text.en: Cause all harmful actions and obscurations ofspeechto be purified!
text.en-trans: ngak gi dikdrib tamché dakpar shok

text.en: May joining my hands at the region of my heart
text.en-trans: talmo nyinggé tedu jarwa yi

text.en: Cause all harmful actions and obscurations ofmindto be purified!
text.en-trans: yi kyi dikdrib tamché dakpar shok

text.en: May drawing apart my two hands once again
text.en-trans: talmo jarwa sosor chewa yi

text.en: Cause the two form kāyas to act for beings’ benefit!
text.en-trans: zukku nyi kyi dro dönjé par shok

text.en: May touching my two knees to the ground
text.en-trans: kang nyi pümo sa la tsukpa yi

text.en: Cause the lower realms of saṃsāra to be liberated!
text.en-trans: khorwa ngensong né lé tarwar shok

text.en: May touching the ten fingers of my two hands to the ground
text.en-trans: lak nyi sor chu sa la tsukpa yi

text.en: Cause us all to traverse the ten stages and five paths!
text.en-trans: sa chu lam nga rimgyi dröpar shok

text.en: May touching my forehead to the ground
text.en-trans: gowo tralwa sa la tsukpa yi

text.en: Cause us all to attain the eleventhbhūmiof Universal Radiance!
text.en-trans: chuchik küntu ö kyi sa tob shok

text.en: May extending and contracting my four limbs
text.en-trans: yenlak zhipo kyang kum jepa yi

text.en: Cause us to spontaneously accomplish the four types of activity!
text.en-trans: trinlé nam zhi lhün gyi drubpar shok

text.en: May extending and contracting all the channels of my body
text.en-trans: tsagyü tamché kyang kum jepa yi

text.en: Cause all knots in the subtle channels to be released!
text.en-trans: tsa dü tamché malü drolwar shok

text.en: May flexing my spine in the centre of my body
text.en-trans: gal tsik umar gyé guk jepa yi

text.en: Cause all subtle wind-energies to enter the central channel!
text.en-trans: lung nam malü umar tsüpar shok

text.en: May touching the ground, then rising from it once again,
text.en-trans: sa la tuk né yar la dangwa yi

text.en: Ensure that we do not remain in saṃsāra but find the path to freedom!
text.en-trans: khorwar mi né tarlam tobpar shok

text.en: Thus, through offering a great many prostrations,
text.en-trans: dené len mang du mar chaktsalwé

text.en: May we not remain in peace but guide all beings!
text.en-trans: zhiwar mi né semchen drenpar shok

text.en: By the power of this virtuous offering of full prostrations,
text.en-trans: dak sok kyang chak pulwé gewé tü

text.en: May we gain the temporary benefits of long-life, good health and prosperity!
text.en-trans: nekab tsering nemé püntsok shok

text.en: When we die, may we be reborn in Sukhāvatī,
text.en-trans: chi tsé dewachen du kyé né kyang

text.en: And then swiftly attain the level of perfect Buddhahood!
text.en-trans: dzokpé sangye gopang nyur tob shok

text.en: May all sentient beings, our very own parents, be happy!
text.en-trans: pama semchen tamché dé dangden gyur ching

text.en: May all the lower realms be forever empty!
text.en-trans: ngendro tamché taktu tongwa dang

text.en: And for all the bodhisattvas, wherever they may be,
text.en-trans: changchub sempa gang na su zhukpa

text.en: May each and every prayer of aspiration be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: dedak kün gyi mönlam drub gyur chik
